title: [K-12] Technology Communication-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic theories of mathematics education and experience in instructional design
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service math teachers at vocational training institutions to enhance instructional design competencies by applying TPC (Technical Communication) principles.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain at least three mathematics instructional design models based on the TPCK framework
Learners can create improved mathematics lesson plans tailored to learner needs after analyzing existing textbooks/syllabi
Learners can develop five or more assessment items using technological communication tools in blended learning environments

resources: Mathematics Education TPC (Teaching, Practice, Creation) Textbook

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
